meanings.definition: To incorrectly assign a number to something.
meanings.sent1: She kept misnumbering the pages in her notebook, causing confusion.
meanings.sent2: The teacher realized she was misnumbering the math problems on the board.
meanings.sent3: The misnumbering of the street addresses led to a mix-up in mail delivery.
meanings.sent4: His habit of misnumbering dates made it challenging to track events accurately.
meanings.sent5: Misnumbering the steps in the recipe resulted in a disastrous cake.

meanings.definition: The act of numbering something incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: The misnumbering of the files caused delays in finding important documents.
meanings.sent2: He discovered the misnumbering of the pages in the book after a thorough check.
meanings.sent3: The misnumbering of the seating arrangements at the event created a humorous mix-up.
meanings.sent4: The misnumbering of the stars in the sky made the constellation unrecognizable.
meanings.sent5: The misnumbering of the hotel rooms led to guests entering the wrong rooms.
